NEWS_09062013DOWMSFT.json.title: Has Microsoft's Bing Search Engine Really Been A Hit?
NEWS_09062013DOWMSFT.json.description: [at Motley Fool] - Search engine Bing has been touted as one of Microsoft's Ballmer-era hits. But just how big of a "hit" has it been, really?

NEWS_09062013DOWMSFT.json.title: Asha to Ashes: Microsoft's emerging market conundrum
NEWS_09062013DOWMSFT.json.description: [Reuters] - By Jeremy Wagstaff and Devidutta Tripathy SINGAPORE/NEW DELHI (Reuters) - Microsoft Corp's acquisition of Nokia's handset business gives the software behemoth control of its main Windows smartphone partner, ...
